title: Exploratory Data Analysis - Movies Correlation Project
description: An EDA on a movies dataset is done using Pandas, Seaborn, Numpy, and Matplotlib frameworks from Python. The main objective was to determine whether there are correlation among multiple variables.

title: COVID Dashboard as per January 2022
description: Dashboard done with Tableau Public from COVID 19 Dataset. It was previously cleaned and organized with Microsoft Excel.

title: FIFA WC 2022 Best National teams analysis
description: An analysis on the FIFA 23 Players dataset was done with Python using Jupyter Notebook to find out the top 5 national teams.

title: Hydrogen Supply Scenario, 2021-2030 Analysis and Tableau Dashboard
description: A SQL Server analysis and a Tableau dashboard on the Hydrogen Projects Database was developed focusing on the 2021-2030 scenario from the IEA dataset.

title: Published research article and Tableau Dashboard
description: The 'Enhanced calcium carbonate scale inhibitor based on linseed mucilage' article was published on Brazilian Journal of Petroleum and Gas, and an interactive Tableau dashboard was developed.
